title: Micro-Suturing Skill Training Module Utilizing Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental surgical techniques and anatomical knowledge
context.additional_context: Hybrid online-offline learning environment using digital devices, combining low-cost glove models for practical training with mental practice in self-directed systems

learning_goals: Perform 2mm interval micro-suturing on a rubber glove model with 90% accuracy within 8 weeks
Plan and execute mental practice sessions at least twice weekly using self-regulated learning strategies
Analyze three core elements of suturing performance (accuracy, speed, stability) and propose improvements through peer evaluation in PBL team projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
